verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1588>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1588>elect<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%>;

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5319>has<s%> in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2782>preaching<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> is committed <S%G4100>unto<s%> <S%G1473>me<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%>;

To <S%G5103>Titus<s%>, my <S%G1103>own<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%>, <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, and <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%>.

For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G5484>cause<s%> <S%G2641>I<s%> left <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2914>Crete<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you should set in <S%G1930>order<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that are <S%G3007>lacking<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2525>ordain<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> had <S%G1299>appointed<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> a <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G410>blameless<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3623>steward<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G829>selfwilled<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> soon <S%G3711>angry<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> given to <S%G3943>wine<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4131>violent<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> given to filthy <S%G146>money<s%>;
<S%G235>But<s%> a lover of <S%G5382>hospitality<s%>, a lover of good <S%G5358>men<s%>, <S%G4998>sober<s%>, <S%G1342>just<s%>, <S%G3741>holy<s%>, <S%G1468>temperate<s%>;

Holding <S%G472>fast<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> he has been <S%G1322>taught<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>teaching<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1651>convince<s%> the <S%G483>deniers<s%>.
<S%G3361>Not<s%> giving heed <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G2451>Jewish<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, that turn <S%G654>from<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

Unto the <S%G2513>pure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2513>pure<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> unto them that are <S%G3392>defiled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is <S%G2513>pure<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> are <S%G3392>defiled<s%>.

They <S%G3670>profess<s%> that they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> in <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G5607>him<s%>, being <S%G947>abominable<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G96>rejected<s%>.
